Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class StartScreenController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.StartScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MuteToggle, GUIController
public class StartScreenController extends Object implements GUIController, MuteToggle
This class is the controller of the start screen.
